meanings.definition: To experience again, especially in one's imagination or memory.
meanings.sent1: She relived her childhood memories while looking at old photographs.
meanings.sent2: After watching the movie, he relived the excitement of his first trip to the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: The little girl relived her favorite storybook by acting out the characters with her toys.
meanings.sent4: As she closed her eyes, she relived the thrill of skydiving in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies baking in the oven made her relive the warmth of her grandmother's kitchen.

meanings.definition: To live through or experience again (a past event or time).
meanings.sent1: He relived the joy of his graduation day every time he looked at his diploma.
meanings.sent2: The war veteran often relived the intense moments of combat in his dreams.
meanings.sent3: The actor relived his famous role from the play during the cast reunion.
meanings.sent4: Every time she visited the old town, she relived the nostalgia of her childhood summers.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the ocean breeze made him relive the freedom of sailing on the open sea.
